proTip: YSAG is a non-profit organization entirely run by students for students.

missionVision.title: Our Vision
missionVision.description: To establish a new generation of highly skilled students who are able to compete with future industry and life requirements.

missionVision.title: Our Mission
missionVision.description: Prepare students for industry, provide huge information resources, and connect students to research fields.

missionVision.title: What is YSAG?
missionVision.description: We provide high-quality explained videos, remedial classes, and comprehensive E-learning libraries.
